metadata.description: Subnet resource Ids for all AKS clusters nodepools in all attached spokes to allow necessary outbound traffic through the firewall

The hub's regional affinity. All resources tied to this hub will also be homed in this region.  The network team maintains this approved regional list which is a subset of zones with Availability Zone support.
A /24 to contain the firewall, management, and gateway subnet
A /26 under the VNet Address Space for Azure Firewall
A /27 under the VNet Address Space for our On-Prem Gateway
A /27 under the VNet Address Space for Azure Bastion

resources.name: [variables('hubLaName')]
resources.comments: This Log Analytics workspace stores logs from the regional hub network, its spokes, and bastion.

resources.name: [guid(resourceGroup().id, 'Azure Firewalls')]
resources.comments: Deploys the default Azure Firewall workbook from https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Network-Security/blob/master/Azure%20Firewall/Azure%20Monitor%20Workbook/Azure%20Firewall_ARM.json

resources.name: [variables('bastionNetworkNsgName')]
resources.comments: Wraps the AzureBastion subnet in this regional hub

properties.description: Allow our users in. Update this to be as restrictive as possible.
Service Requirement. Allow control plane access. Regional Tag not yet supported.
Allow SSH out to the VNet
Unused, but required for ARM validation.
Required for control plane outbound. Regional prefix not yet supported

resources.name: [variables('hubVnetName')]
resources.comments: This is this region's hub network.

resources.name: [variables('defaultFwPipName')]
resources.comments: This is the public IP for this regional hub's firewall.

resources.name: [variables('bastionPipName')]
resources.comments: This is the public IP for this regional hub's Azure Bastion service.

resources.name: [variables('bastionServiceName')]
resources.comments: This is this regional hub's Azure Bastion service.

resources.name: [variables('aksIpGroupName')]
resources.comments: This holds IP addresses of known nodepool subnets in spokes.

resources.name: [variables('hubFwName')]
resources.comments: This is the regional azure firewall that all regional spoke networks egress through.

rules.name: ICMP Protocol
rules.description: Block all outgoing ICMP

rules.name: ntp
rules.description: Network Time Protocol (NTP) time synchronization required by AKS cluster nodes

rules.name: tunnel-front-pod-tcp
rules.description: Tunnel front pod to communicate with the tunnel end on the API server. Technically only needed to our API servers.

rules.name: tunnel-front-pod-udp
rules.description: Tunnel front pod to communicate with the tunnel end on the API server.  Technically only needed to our API servers.

rules.name: DNS
rules.description: Support DNS lookups. Consider restricting further.

rules.name: HTTP-and-HTTPS
rules.description: Allow, but log, all 80 and 443 traffic outbound. Consider restricting further.

rules.name: microsoft-container-registry
rules.description: All URLs related to MCR needed by AKS

rules.name: azure-monitor-for-containers
rules.description: This endpoint is used to send metrics data and logs to Log Analytics.

rules.name: azure-policy-addon
rules.description: Required for AKS clusters that have Azure Policy enabled.

rules.name: management-plane
rules.description: This address is required for Kubernetes GET/PUT operations.

rules.name: aad-auth
rules.description: This address is required for Azure Active Directory authentication.

rules.name: apt-get
rules.description: This address is the Microsoft packages repository used for cached apt-get operations. Example packages include Moby, PowerShell, and Azure CLI.

rules.name: cluster-binaries
rules.description: This address is for the repository required to install required binaries like kubenet and Azure CNI.

rules.name: ubuntu-security-patches
rules.description: This address lets the Linux cluster nodes download the required security patches and updates per https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/aks/limit-egress-traffic#optional-recommended-fqdn--application-rules-for-aks-clusters.

rules.name: ubuntu-misc-https
rules.description: Other common Ubuntu requests. Can block if desired.

rules.name: ubuntu-misc-http
rules.description: Other common Ubuntu requests. Can block if desired.

rules.name: azure-monitor
rules.description: All required for Azure Monitor for containers per https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/aks/limit-egress-traffic#azure-monitor-for-containers

rules.name: azure-policy
rules.description: All required for Azure Policy per https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/aks/limit-egress-traffic#azure-policy

rules.name: nodes-to-api-server
rules.description: This address is required for Node <-> API server communication.

rules.name: flux-to-github
rules.description: This address is required for Flux <-> Github repository with the desired cluster baseline configuration.
